action.description: Adopted as amended in HD 1 with Representative(s) Belatti, Chun, Kila, Matayoshi voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Alcos, Garcia, Garrett, Grandinetti, Hussey, Iwamoto, Marten, Matsumoto, Muraoka, Perruso, Pierick, Reyes Oda, Shimizu, Templo voting no (14) and  Representative(s) Cochran, La Chica, Woodson excused (3).
